channel.title: Changing background
channel.description:
I need help to change the background of the Battlescape Client. Like i looked for Background.png but its not in there so i dont know how to change the background.
Fat Cookies edit: use more descriptive thread titles. "Client help" is the name of the board there is no reason you should repeat this as your thread title.
